entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -24.4°C
entry.summary:

Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 75 %

Dewpoint: -27.5°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the evening and ending before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
